reviewText: The basic story was good, the main character was very real (except for the few scenes with the dubbed in sounds) but some of the characters were creepy or unnecessary. The sex scene where the main character and her girl friend masturbate together was hot and the final scene with the guy she ultimately finds on line was good but that gives you 15 minutes of good movie to watch. This movie could have been so much better.

Sex is fun and the search for it can be a pretty good time, too. TRIAL RUN is fun, funny, and full of reality. I liked the heroine cuz she was real, a real woman, attractive but not pornoflix sleek and all airbrushy. I liked the sparky dom enormously. Wouldn't it be grand to have a pal like her to vet all our blind dates for us? I liked the little dog and I liked the clown. Dear heavens, what couldn't he do? I liked the hero. He, too, was real in way that was endearing. I liked all the weird cruds in the painfully real online dating lineup, especially the beer-swilling survivalist. Loved the dungeon scene, but my gawd, the tango scene was breathtaking. The sets and costumes were just right and the photography throughout was excellent. TRIAL RUN is fun, funny and hot, end to end. A wonderful flick!

Trial Run is incredible! It is one of the funniest, exciting, never-a-dull-moment, realistic, sexy, woman-centered movies I've seen in a long time. The sex scenes are fabulous. Buy it if for no other reason than to check out the clown scene and the tango scene - both are hot, hot, hot in completely different ways. Plus it's jammed-packed with behind-the-scenes footage, which allows you to further experience the realness of the entire endeavor - not only of the storyline, but of the creation of the film itself.
oooh...so divine I had to pause it and dive into the pool with with my boy friend. once again libido films delivers a grand slam

Wow! The standard for erotic entertainment went up several notches with this new Libido Films release. The tango scene alone is worth the price to me. It provided me with enough fantasy material for a good time to come (no pun intended). As a woman I really appreciate how different this film is....the plot is inventive and so is the sex. There are no speed through scenes. You'll want to enjoy every last drop.
